resources.string: That\'s it - you have completed the free version of MemMaze. Congratulations! We hope you had a really great time! If you want more levels or just really love this game, why not head over to Android Market and buy MemMaze Premium?
That\'s it - you have completed MemMaze. Congratulations! We hope you had a really great time! By the way - have you scored 100% on all levels yet? If not, your work here is not complete.
